channel.title: Need server help
channel.description:
when ever i change the ip of my client to my global ip after portforwarding my client still doesnt connect. it sits at 1%.
so i changed my server ip to my global ip. still only work on my local computer. could it be that im running my client from a bat.
if so im not reallly sure how to make a replacement jar. as all the jars i make arn't working. they dont open. could someone please walk me through this last step.?
for the server do i leave ir localhost. or change it.
for the client do i change it.
where are and what are the files that actually controll the ip. cause i dont see anything happening with me changing the file i have.
and how do i make a new non localhosted jar. i have jar maker but it doesnt i open when i click my new jar.

item.title: Need server help
item.dc:creator: @Taharahora Taharahora
item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

I private messaged you.

Read full topic
